alert.note: Alert for Howell; Oregon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 6:44PM CDT until July 17 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Howell County in south central Missouri... Oregon County in south central Missouri... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 644 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fremont to near West Plains, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... West Plains... Grand Gulf State Park... Thayer... Mammoth Spring... Alton... South Fork... Koshkonong... Brandsville... Thomasville... Mammoth Spring State Park... Lanton... Myrtle... Wilderness... Couch... Pottersville... Rover... Greer... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
